overview:
James is the Founder CEO of musicVault Limited (http://www.yourmusicvault.com) and creator of the musicVaultSidebar, the content aggregator application for iTunes.

Having worked around technology almost his whole professional life, when he saw the opportunity for a convenient Direct to Consumer application which saves consumers the time it takes to find the best music related content online, James decided to do it himself. Even though at the time he couldn’t write programming language or have the money to pay someone else to do it for him.

In addition to musicVault, he’s gone on to help develop other digital media concepts including Extrafriends.co.uk - a niche social network for Film & T.V Extras, Omniverse Vision - an alternative cinema content company and IndaClub - a dedicated mobile social app for people planning a great night out.

degrees.subject: Maths
degrees.institution: Queen Mary & Westfield College, Univ. of London
